page.title: 17WELFARE, LYNEMOUTH.
page.content: {Community Work cont'd. Young people are also catered for in the Day-Centre.A youth-club is held and regular Disco-type events are arranged.Throughout the school holidays a Play-Scheme is provided particularly for the under twelve-year olds. Staff to help run this venture is provided partially by Local Authority and partially by Voluntary Associations. {School. Lynemouth First School is in itself a centre for a variety of social functions. {Co-operative Guild. For many years a Co-operative Guild has been held in school.This group meets fortnightly and often they have guest speakers at their meetings.
